actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that officers appointed in the Medical Service Corps of the Navy from other commissioned status shall not lose rank or pay or allowances.

summary.text: Provides that officers appointed in the Medical Service Corps of the Navy from other commissioned status shall not suffer any reduction in rank or pay or allowances to which he was entitled at the time of his appointment. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 5579(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that officers appointed in the Medical Service Corps of the Navy from other commissioned status shall not lose rank or pay or allowances.
